required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ThermoSmart® Versus Conventional Humidification in Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP)
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective, Randomized, Double-blind Cross-over Study Comparing ThermoSmart® to Conventional Heated Humidity in Patients Suing Continuous Positive Airway Pressure

brief_summary.textblock: That ThermoSMart humidification will result in greater compliance (mask on time, objective and subjective sleep quality than conventional humidification.

arm_group.arm_group_label: CPAP with ThermoSmart, then CPAP without ThermoSmart
arm_group.description: CPAP with ThermoSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification and a heated breathing tube. CPAP without ThermSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification without a heated breathing tube.

arm_group.arm_group_label: CPAP without ThermoSmart, then CPAP with ThermoSmart
arm_group.description: CPAP with ThermoSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification and a heated breathing tube. CPAP without ThermSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification without a heated breathing tube.

intervention.intervention_name: CPAP with ThermoSmart, then CPAP without ThermoSmart
intervention.description: CPAP with ThermoSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification and a heated breathing tube. CPAP without ThermSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification without a heated breathing tube.
intervention.arm_group_label: CPAP with ThermoSmart, then CPAP without ThermoSmart

intervention.intervention_name: CPAP without ThermoSmart, then CPAP with ThermoSmart
intervention.description: CPAP with ThermoSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification and a heated breathing tube. CPAP without ThermSmart is the application of CPAP with heated humidification without a heated breathing tube.
intervention.arm_group_label: CPAP without ThermoSmart, then CPAP with ThermoSmart

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. ≥ 18 years of age
2. Previous diagnosis of OSA permitted, but patient must be novel to CPAP and no previous surgical intervention for OSA or treatment with an oral appliance.
3. AHI ≥ 15 OR AHI ≥ 5 + ESS ≥ 10 OR ESS ≥ 10 + a medical co-morbidity
4. Patient willing to give informed consent and follow study protocol.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Wake resting SpO2 < 90%
2. Patient requires BiLevel PAP or supplemental oxygen
3. The patient is medically unstable (e.g. respiratory or cardiac failure)
4. Patient unwilling to give informed consent or follow study protocol.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: All data from this trial has been lost This includes all case report forms and consent forms and therefore, there are no results to report as no data exists

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
